title: Edward Tsanga
text: Edward Tsanga (Цанга, Эдуард Николаевич; <a href="Syktyvkar">Syktyvkar</a>, 20 October 1979 – 14 January 2017, <a href="Saint%20Petersburg">Saint Petersburg</a>) was a Russian <a href="opera">opera</a>tic <a href="bass-baritone">bass-baritone</a> at the <a href="Mariinsky%20Opera">Mariinsky Opera</a>. His video recordings include roles in two operas under <a href="Valery%20Gergiev">Valery Gergiev</a>: as the tsar in <a href="Nikolai%20Rimsky-Korsakov">Rimsky-Korsakov</a>'s "<a href="The%20Tale%20of%20Tsar%20Saltan%20%28Rimsky-Korsakov%29">The Tale of Tsar Saltan</a>", and Platov in <a href="Rodion%20Shchedrin">Rodion Shchedrin</a>'s "<a href="The%20Left-Hander%20%28opera%29">The Left-Hander</a>".
